snippet: Employees at the German drug maker wondered how the bottom line might be affected by safety tests for patients taking the antistroke drug.
lead_paragraph: Employees at the German drug maker wondered how the bottom line might be affected by safety tests for patients taking the antistroke drug.

headline.main: New Emails in Pradaxa Case Show Concern Over Profit
